trans-unit.target: TEXT_SUBCTS682_04717_SEQ_00<tab>Eo Tyr is looking particularly pleased with themself.
TEXT_SUBCTS682_04717_EOTYR_000_001<tab>Oooh, sapling of the king! I have a fascinating delight to show you.
TEXT_SUBCTS682_04717_EOTYR_000_002<tab>...But he seems to have wandered off somewhere. Could you look for him, please?
TEXT_SUBCTS682_04717_EOTYR_000_003<tab>And when I say “him” I mean...Another Anden. You'll know him once you find him─you'll see!
TEXT_SUBCTS682_04717_EOTYR_100_003<tab>He can't have gone far. Go on, go on! Find Another Anden.
TEXT_SUBCTS682_04717_SYSTEM_000_005<tab>This loitering lump of leaves looks strikingly like an Anden you once knew. Perhaps this is what Eo Tyr is seeking.
TEXT_SUBCTS682_04717_SYSTEM_100_007<tab>This leafman is straining to communicate, but unlike Anden, it seems incapable of speech.
TEXT_SUBCTS682_04717_EOTYR_000_011<tab>Now, I have prepared this sweet shrublet for a very special reason. Will you hear it?
TEXT_SUBCTS682_04717_EOTYR_000_012<tab>As long as I have known him, I have always, <var 1A 02 /var>always<var 1A 01 /var> longed to speak with Anden. Oooh, how I hoped and pined.

TEXT_SUBCTS682_04717_EOTYR_000_013<tab>Then suddenly, my wish came true! Now here I am, spending day after day talking and laughing and playing with you both. I don't think any pixie has ever known such fun.

TEXT_SUBCTS682_04717_EOTYR_000_014<tab>That is why I wish to repay your kindness with a little gift─not a talking leafman, but a <var 1A 02 /var>walking<var 1A 01 /var> leafman! His name is “Anden III.”

TEXT_SUBCTS682_04717_EOTYR_000_015<tab>I borrowed some of Original Anden's leaves after pruning him. Twist a branch here, nip a bud there─and there you have it! Oooh, isn't he adorable? Your very own Personal Anden!
TEXT_SUBCTS682_04717_EOTYR_000_016<tab>Speaking of personal, I mustn't keep you long, lest the king think I'm trying to steal away their precious sapling.
TEXT_SUBCTS682_04717_EOTYR_000_017<tab>As though I would, when I have Anden. Oooh, Anden!
